title: Grounds for Divorce
text: California is a "no-fault" divorce state.  The grounds for divorce are irreconcilable differences or incurable insanity.

title: Residency Requirement
text: To file for divorce in California, at least one spouse must have been a resident for six months and a resident of the county for three months.

question: How do I file for divorce?
answer: You can file for divorce by completing the required forms and filing them with the court.
